name: Cat
description: Lions have strong, compact bodies and powerful forelegs, teeth and jaws for pulling down and killing prey. Their coats are yellow-gold, and adult males have shaggy manes that range in color from blond to reddish-brown to black.

characteristics.prey: Wildebeests, antelopes, zebras, buffalos, rodents, and more

name: Golden Lion Tamarin
description: Lions have strong, compact bodies and powerful forelegs, teeth and jaws for pulling down and killing prey. Their coats are yellow-gold, and adult males have shaggy manes that range in color from blond to reddish-brown to black.

characteristics.main_prey: Fruit, Insects, Small Mammals, Small Reptiles
characteristics.slogan: Native to the eastern rainforests of Brazil!

name: Monkey
description: Lions have strong, compact bodies and powerful forelegs, teeth and jaws for pulling down and killing prey. Their coats are yellow-gold, and adult males have shaggy manes that range in color from blond to reddish-brown to black.

characteristics.most_distinctive_feature: Long and thick hairy mane of the male around the face
characteristics.slogan: Lives in small groups called prides!

name: Panda
description: Lions have strong, compact bodies and powerful forelegs, teeth and jaws for pulling down and killing prey. Their coats are yellow-gold, and adult males have shaggy manes that range in color from blond to reddish-brown to black.

characteristics.estimated_population_size: Possibly millions its IUCN conservation status is unevaluated, but not in danger of extinction
characteristics.other_name(s): Giant jellyfish, hair jellyfish, hair jellyfish, mane jellyfish, Arctic red jellyfish, sea nettle, sea blubber, winter jellyfish
characteristics.predators: Seabirds, sea turtles, anemones, ocean sunfish, larger jellies but only when the jellyfish is a juvenile.
